sentences.sContent: Without much ado just start typing or writing down what type of life you really want to live.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without much ado just start typing or writing down what type of life you really want to live.
sentences.sCn: 无需太多忙乱，只要开始键入或写下你真正想过的是什么类型的生活。

phrases.pCn: 没有再费周折；立即；干脆痛快
